Caption: I marked that target with a narc.
Name: MarkedNarc1

Caption: Narc deployed on target.
Name: MarkedNarc2

Caption: Ha, Preacher's blessed that target with a narc!
Name: MarkedNarc3

Caption: Narc successful. Target is marked!
Name: MarkedNarc4

Caption: Lasing target with tag.
Name: MarkedTag1

Caption: Lighting up that hostile with a tag.
Name: MarkedTag2

Caption: Hold still son. I gotta bless you with a tag.
Name: MarkedTag3

Caption: Lasing target…with tag.
Name: MarkedTag4

Caption: Marking that target with tag!
Name: MarkedTag5

Name: MarkedTag6

Caption: Lighting up that hostile. Oh he's getting tagged.

Caption: Marking that target with tag

Name: AttackNarced5

Name: AttackTagged1

Caption: Weapons on lased Target!
Name: AttackTagged6

Caption: Oh, damn it's cold! Give me something I can melt.
Name: Arctic1

Caption: Ha, this is definitely not my kinda place.
Name: Arctic2

Caption: I can't get off this sh.. Snowball planet fast enough. Lets keep moving.
Name: Arctic3

Caption: Ah, I hate the cold. I hate the snow. I hate this place!
Name: Arctic4

Caption: Ah, they told me it would be a nice planet.
Name: Arctic5

Caption: Ugh, I hate the cold.
Name: Arctic6

Caption: Argh, I hate the cold.
Name: Arctic7

Caption: Cold and snow is ba..bad enough, add permafrost and glaciers, ughhh!
Name: ArcticGlacial1

Caption: I can't imagine living in a place like this.
Name: ArcticGlacial2

Caption: Cold and snow is bad enough. Add permafrost and glaciers? Ugh!
Name: ArcticGlacial3

Caption: Ice worlds like this suck. Let's finish this up. Get off this dump.
Name: ArcticGlacial4

Caption: Ice worlds like this suck. Lets finish the Op and get off this icecube.
Name: ArcticGlacial5

Caption: Ice worlds like this suck. Lets finish this Op and get off this rock.
Name: ArcticGlacial6

Caption: Ice worlds like this…. suck. Lets finish this Op and get off this dump.
Name: ArcticGlacial7

Caption: If it gets any colder, we're gonna have sensor problems. Keep moving!
Name: ArcticGlacial8

Caption: If it gets any colder. I'm gonna have sensor problems. Keep moving!
Name: ArcticGlacial9

Caption: Yeah, but look at the view. Ha, all it needs is a pond, a creek and to be somewhere the hell else.
Name: Canyon1

Caption: Well, you got dust and tumble weeds. Lovely. Who sets up bases in places like this?
Name: Canyon2

Caption: Dust and tumble weeds. Ugh, who sets up bases in places like this?
Name: Canyon3

Caption: I'd envoke the great maker to damn this place to hell, but it looks like someone beat him too it.
Name: Canyon4

Caption: Well, if this place had some ponds, some creeks, it would be pretty nice! Looks completely damned to me.
Name: Canyon5

Caption: If this place had ponds and creeks it would be nice… but… it doesn’t.
Name: Canyon6

Caption: If this place had ponds and creeks it would be nice… but… it doesn’t.
Name: Canyon7

Caption: Oh, it’s a blessing. We only have to be in this cursed place for a short time.
Name: Canyon8

Caption: Staring at this dust bowl… is making me thirsty.
Name: Canyon9

Caption: Based on the scouting report, and the environmentals, I believe this is where the devil works from home.
Name: Canyon10

Caption: Dust and tumble weeds. Tumble weeds and dust. Who sets up bases in places like this?
Name: Canyon11

Caption: Well, I'd like to get the devil on coms. I think I can make him a trade. His place for this'un.
Name: Canyon12

Caption: Frankly, it's amazing anything can grow out here.
Name: CanyonLush1

Caption: Ah, this place is such a maze. Everything looks the same like god just ran out of ideas and said 'ah that's good.'
Name: CanyonLush2

Caption: Ah, it's easy to get lost in this maze of canyons. Everything looks the same.
Name: CanyonLush3

Caption: I wanna shoot up some of these canyon walls just so they won’t all stay looking the same. Ya get lost out here.
Name: CanyonLush4

Caption: It’s a verifiable miracle anything can grow... out here.
Name: CanyonLush5

Caption: Stuck in a canyon is tactically dangerous. Watch those ridges.
Name: CanyonLush6

Caption: Brothers and sisters, this aint no canyon, it’s a kill box. Watch those ridges cause that’s where it's gonna come raining down on us.
Name: CanyonLush7

Caption: You see those flat top rock formations up there? That make me nervous. Everybody keep your eyes peeled.
Name: CanyonLush8

Caption: This place… Hmm. Looks familiar, don't it?
Name: Earthlike1

Caption: Hmm, this place… This place looks familiar, don't it?
Name: Earthlike2

Caption: Oh I know this just looks like nothing but sand all over now, but if you really was to dig deep down here you would… Ha, who am I kidding?
Name: EarthlikeDesert1

Caption: Just take a look around, we got sand, sand, and more sand. You know what this place needs? Yeah sand.
Name: EarthlikeDesert2

Caption: This looks like another place where the maker just put down some sand and ran out of ideas, just didn't come back. I don't blame'em.
Name: EarthlikeDesert3

Caption: Are you sure this LZ is not a mistake? Cause this place is freaking beautiful.
Name: Forest1

Caption: Nice area. Too bad we gotta fight in it.
Name: Forest2

Caption: There is something very comforting about all these trees. Hey gotta say it that sometimes church comes to you. Welp, that was nice. Lets go blow it up.
Name: Forest3

Caption: Wow, the natrual beauty here. Quite breathtaking. Ah, lets go smite somebody.
Name: Forest4

Caption: Ah, this place reminds me of home!
Name: Forest5

Caption: Hey, them trees look heavenly, but there's hell hiding behind them. Keep sharp!
Name: Forest6

Caption: Them trees are very pretty, but I'm more worried about the bushes. Ambushes!
Name: Forest7

Caption: Yeah, them trees are awful pretty, but they also make really big cover. Keep a sharp watch.
Name: Forest8

Caption: If we could speed up the field trip, the time for gawking at colors is later. We gotta get moving now.
Name: ForestAutumn1

Caption: Enjoy that pretty color while you can boys and girls… ah, snows a coming.
Name: ForestAutumn2

Caption: Fall colors give this place a much prettier view.
Name: ForestAutumn3

Caption: I suggest we keep moving, there will be a time to look at scenery later.
Name: ForestAutumn4

Caption: Missions are a lot easier to take when the scenery is this pretty. Love that color.
Name: ForestAutumn5

Caption: Wow, I could relax in a place like this for months!
Name: ForestSummer1

Caption: Aim up my brothers and sisters, do not let temptation blind you to the dangers of this mission. Keep focused.
Name: ForestSummer2

Caption: Yeah, looks like a perfect summer out there.
Name: ForestSummer3

Caption: Yeah, this is my kinda place. Awful pretty.
Name: ForestSummer4

Caption: Don't forget what you're sitting inside of, and don't forget the mission. Don't be distracted. Stay focused.
Name: ForestSummer5

Caption: So this is where the makers been hiding all the good stuff.
Name: ForestSummer6

Caption: Ah brothers and sisters, I think we found the one place in the galaxy where the travel posters don't lie.
Name: ForestSummer7

Caption: Yeah it's cold but the heatsinks like it. And it's not like it's that bad, we've seen a hell of a lot worse places than this.
Name: ForestWinter1

Caption: Even burried under snow, I can just tell underneath all this is a place I'd really like to be.
Name: ForestWinter2

Caption: Hmm, even under snow, I could get used to a place like this. Awful pretty.
Name: ForestWinter3

Caption: It's not so bad I think I can handle this weather. It's a lot better than some shitholes we've seen right?
Name: ForestWinter4

Caption: Yeah, you may not like the cold but my thermal sights do. Makes the enemies easier to spot out here.
Name: ForestWinter5

Caption: I've been around a time or two. The winters here look pretty managable to me.
Name: ForestWinter6

Caption: I like what you've done with the place. Uh, no vegitation to uh... block your sightlines for battle is very... very neat.
Name: Hostile1

Caption: Well yeah it is a hellhole, but it's a dry kinda hellhole.
Name: Hostile2

Caption: I think I can make the enemy stop fighting for this piece of land. Just show them a picture of it.
Name: Hostile3

Caption: This dirt ain't no place for a rightous person. This place is for the damned.
Name: Hostile4

Caption: Uh, I am not a fan of places like this.
Name: Hostile5

Caption: Talk about no signs of life. Looks like the microbes here took a look around and said, 'why bother evolving.'
Name: Hostile6

Caption: This planet reminds me of my ex-wife. She'd love it here.
Name: Hostile7

Caption: I see the maker has done a lot with this place. It's uh... very uh... I mean its uh... Oh hell.
Name: Hostile8

Caption: Ladies and Gentlemen, I have it on the highest authority from above, that this here place is not infact hell... but just the demo.
Name: Hostile9

Caption: Don't ask me how I can smell in a vacuum, but the enemy is near. I can feel it.
Name: HostileMoon1

Caption: I really don't like low atmosphere places.
Name: HostileMoon2

Caption: It's quite out here. Peaceful. Vacuum does that.
Name: HostileMoon3

Caption: I'd like to comeback and see this planet some day…. When god finishes building it.
Name: HostileSulfurous1

Caption: People are crazy living on a planet like this. It's just…. It's just not natural.
Name: HostileSulfurous2

Caption: Say goodbye to your paintjobs fellas. The sulfurous air on this planet is gonna chew the hell outta our mechs.
Name: HostileSulfurous3

Caption: It ain't quite hell, but you sure can smell it from here!
Name: HostileSulfurous4

Caption: You boys hear that rumbling? That’s god rolling up the welcome matt. We should get the heck off this place before it blows.
Name: HostileVolcanic1

Caption: I don't wanna say this planet is hot, but I think I saw an enemy mech hopping on one foot to keep the other one from melting clean off.
Name: HostileVolcanic2

Caption: Fellas, I'm no geologist but that rumble is telling me the faster we get off this planet the better.
Name: HostileVolcanic3

Caption: We're all clear commander. We're rightously ready for engagement.
Name: MissionIntro1

Caption: We will be the rightous victors today. Check your firing arcs. Stay frosty.
Name: MissionIntro2

Caption: Well, the grid seems clear for now commander.
Name: MissionIntro3

Caption: In my assessment commander, the grid seems clear for now.
Name: MissionIntro4

Caption: R.O.E. is at our discreton commander. Shall we smite the enemy?
Name: MissionIntro5

Caption: We're all clear commander. Ready for engagement.
Name: MissionIntro6

Caption: Now I'm not expecting a lot, but stay sharp.
Name: MissionIntro7

Caption: Glad to join the company commander. Lets kick some ass!
Name: PilotHired1

Caption: Oh, I have come to bring them the word. The word of the day is… Goodbye.
Name: PilotHired2

Caption: What the? agghh! No!
Name: DiedPilot1

Caption: Well that’s not good. *gasp* Dust to dust boys.
Name: DiedPilot2

Caption: no, No, NO, NOOO!
Name: DiedPilot3

Caption: Sorry fellas. Amen and good b…..
Name: DiedPilot4

Caption: Awe, hell! Ahhh….
Name: DiedPilot5

Caption: Awe, mech's gone critical. Eject! Eject! Ej…....
Name: UnitCritical1

Caption: Awe, my mech's gone critical. I need to eject. Eject! Eject!
Name: UnitCritical2

Caption: Preacher here, my mech's gone critical. I'm gonna have to eject. Church is out boys. Eject! Eject!
Name: UnitCritical3

Caption: Preacher here, we just lost one!
Name: DiedUnitLance1

Caption: Alert, friendly down!
Name: DiedUnitLance2

Caption: We're down one!
Name: DiedUnitLance3

Caption: Well, seems like the rightous few are just we two. You take point. I'll cover you.
Name: LastLancemateStanding1

Caption: Well, just me and you left commander.
Name: LastLancemateStanding2

Caption: Well, it's just down to the two of us commander.
Name: LastLancemateStanding3

Caption: Looks like our flock is down to just you and me commander.
Name: LastLancemateStanding4

Caption: Just two of us left. Well this here song's got one more verse. You take point. I'm covering.
Name: LastLancemateStanding5

Caption: Ha, can't believe I made it. Now, I'm gonna hate this walk.
Name: EjectedCritical1

Caption: Fighting effectiveness zero. I need to eject. See ya later fellas.
Name: EjectedHelpless1

Caption: *Sigh* No longer effective. Ejecting.
Name: EjectedHelpless2

Caption: Ah, Preacher here. I can't fight anymore. I'm gonna need to eject. Amen and goodluck boys.
Name: EjectedHelpless3

Caption: Preacher here. My mech is scrap. I need to eject. Carry on fellas!
Name: EjectedHelpless4

Caption: All systems critical. Ejecting!
Name: EjectedScared1

Caption: I've got a reactor containment failure. I've got to eject. Goodbye boys.
Name: EjectedScared2

Caption: Preacher here. Another hit and I'm dead. I need to punch out!
Name: EjectedScared3
